text: Thomas Abernethy may refer to * Thomas Abernethy (explorer) (1803–1860), Scottish seafarer, gunner in the Royal Navy, and polar explorer * Thomas Perkins Abernethy (1890–1975), American historian of early American history * Thomas Abernethy (politician) (1903–1998), American politician * Tom Abernethy (born 1954), American professional basketball player ==See also== *Abernethy (surname)
title: Thomas Abernethy
